import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useCart } from "../context/CartContext"; import Breadcrumb from "../components/Layout/Breadcrumb"; const OrderSuccess = () => { const { clearCart } = useCart(); useEffect(() => { // Clear cart on successful order clearCart(); }, [clearCart]); return (

Thank You for Your Order!

Your order has been placed successfully. We've sent you an email with the order details.

Order Information

Order Number: #ORD-{Math.floor(100000 + Math.random() * 900000)}
Date: {new Date().toLocaleDateString()}
Payment Method: Credit Card
Continue Shopping Back to Home
); }; export default OrderSuccess;
